product_name: Mountain Hardwear Pandra Elbow-Sleeve Hoodie - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Mountain Hardwear Pandra Elbow-Sleeve hoodie ensures comfort no matter where your travels lead you. Its blended polyester and wool fabric is warm and breathable. Polyester and wool dri-release(R) jersey fabric blends synthetic and natural fibers to absorb moisture and dry quickly; it's soft, low pilling and odor resistant. Shaped hood offers head and neck coverage; drawcord cinches the fit. Left-hip, flap-close pocket secures small valuables; side gathering detail on Pandra hoodie adds shaping. Semifitted cut is not too tight and not too loose. Closeout.
short_description: The Mountain Hardwear Pandra Elbow-Sleeve hoodie ensures comfort no matter where your travels lead you. Its blended polyester and wool fabric is warm and breathable.
